===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ろせい}} compound {{m|zh|櫓聲|tr=lu<sup>X</sup> syeng|lit=oar + sound}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ろせい|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Alternative forms===

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ろせい|kyu=櫓聲}}

# the [[sound]] of [[rowing]] a [[boat]], particularly the kind of boat with one single [[oar]] attached at the [[stern]], rowed by pushing the oar back and forth
